text: Maurandya antirrhiniflora Maurandella is an obsolete genus of flowering plants in the plantain family, Plantaginaceae. Species formerly placed in Maurandella are placed in Maurandya and Holmgrenanthe. * Maurandella antirrhiniflora (Humb. & Bonpl. ex Willd.) Rothm. is a synonym of Maurandya antirrhiniflora Humb. & Bonpl. ex Willd. * Maurandella hederaefolia Rothm. is a synonym of Maurandya antirrhiniflora subsp. hederifolia (Rothm.) Elisens * Maurandella petrophila (Coville & C.V. Morton) Rothm. is a synonym of Holmgrenanthe petrophila (Coville & C.V. Morton) Elisens ==References== Category:Historically recognized angiosperm genera
title: Maurandella
